'''Radiant Spincrystal 15''' is an item used in the [[Furnishings]] [[Euphonium Unbound: Winding]] or [[Euphonium Unbound: Soaring]] to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] [[Knights of Favonius (Soundtrack)|Knights of Favonius]] in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located on the roof of the [[Knights of Favonius Headquarters]], near the [[Teleport Waypoint]].
